headline: Lululemon (LULU): Reassessing Valuation After Mixed Quarter, Lower Guidance and Margin Pressure from New Tariffs
summary: Lululemon athletica (LULU) just delivered a mixed quarter that is stirring up fresh debate, with healthy international growth offset by sluggish U.S. demand, weaker same store sales, and a cut to full year revenue guidance. See our latest analysis for lululemon athletica. The latest quarter comes after a bruising stretch, with the 1 year total shareholder return down about 52 percent. At the same time, a recent 1 month share price return of roughly 13 percent hints that pessimism might be...
